description: This header file defines utility functions within the Utils namespace for synchronizing file persistence and saving JSON settings to a file. It includes functions for ensuring data is written to disk and for persisting JSON configuration data.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes file data to disk by opening the specified file, flushing its buffers, and calling fsync to ensure data persistence.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON value associated with a key into a specified file, creating or opening the file as needed, updating the JSON object, writing it to the file, and ensuring the changes are synchronized to disk.
